artist: Wenceslaus Hollar; After a follower of Hans Holbein the Younger
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: Jesus wearing a crown of thorns, seated on steps of a large room in shadow; man behind Jesus holds a book onto Jesus's head with a long object; another man behind Jesus lowers a candlestick over his head; man in front of Jesus crouches, offering out a large cup, while other men in back talk
marks:
Inscription

With Sharpest thornes our Saviour t
title: The Mocking of Christ
